candidateData.title: Intrduction
candidateData.shortDescription: My proficiency in modern frontend technologies, showcasing elegant designs and seamless user interactions. With a focus on responsiveness and accessibility, I create engaging web experiences that marry form with function to captivate users and elevate brands.

experience.title: Experience
experience.shortDescription1: The main area of expertise is front end development (client side of the web).
experience.shortDescription2: I have built various different projects to fit different aspects of the client's business. Proven track record of delivering high-quality, user-centric solutions using cutting-edge technologies. Skilled in translating design. Strong expertise in frontend frameworks such as React.js, Angular, Next JS, and Node JS. Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive project success.

timeline.title: Sodexo - Associate Staff Engineer
timeline.description: Build and maintain critical components used to construct Sodexo Frontend, across the whole product. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and product managers, to implement and advocate for best practices in web accessibility.

timeline.title: Maruti Suzuki - Associate Staff Engineer
timeline.description: Build, style, and ship high-quality websites, design systems,and digital experiences for a diverse array of projects for clients.

timeline.title: Schnider Electric - Associate Staff Engineer
timeline.description: Developed and styled interactive web apps for Schnider Electric, including the other services of Schnider Electric’s products with user authentication.

timeline.title: ICICI Bank - Senior Engineer
timeline.description: Build around 1800 of pages of ICICI Products and features with multiple functionalities. Also owned multiple pages responsibility on my own and delivered the same.

timeline.title: Jetblue Airways - Software Engineer
timeline.description: Implement complex UI features and interactions, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and adherence to accessibility standards, Optimize frontend performance through techniques such as lazy loading, code splitting, and image optimization to improve page load times and enhance user experience.

timeline.title: Barnes & Noble - Software Engineer
timeline.description: Design and develop responsive, user-friendly web interfaces, Implement and maintain automated testing frameworks (e.g., Jest) to ensure code quality, reliability, and cross-browser compatibility.

timeline.title: Bharti Airtel - Support Engineer
timeline.description: Design and develop responsive, user-friendly web interfaces using Core Vanilla JavaScript.

projects.title: Projects
projects.shortDescription1: I have built various different projects to enhance my skills as a frontend developer.

timeline.title: Sahu Creations Website
timeline.description: Build and maintain critical components used to construct Sahu creation Frontend, across the whole product. This website is still under development and will be used for my family business

skills.title: Skills
skills.shortDescription1: The main area of expertise is front end development (client side of the web).
skills.shortDescription2: HTML, CSS, JS, building small and medium web applications with Vue or React, custom plugins, features, animations, and coding interactive layouts. I have also full-stack developer experience with one of the most popular open source CMS on the web - AEM
